Sentencas: In this paper, a method of designing control inputs for stochastic nonlinear processes under state-feedback is proposed.
Titulo: Stochastic state-feedback control using homotopy optimization and particle filtering

Sentencas: The objective is to determine a control input that minimizes the expected value of the integral of error between the set-point and the states.
Titulo: Stochastic state-feedback control using homotopy optimization and particle filtering

Sentencas: Since the states may not be measured, they are estimated using a particle filtering algorithm.
Titulo: Stochastic state-feedback control using homotopy optimization and particle filtering

Sentencas: The optimal control design is then reformulated as a parameter estimation problem using control vector parameterization where the inputs are considered as a nonlinear function of the error between the state estimates and the set-point.
Titulo: Stochastic state-feedback control using homotopy optimization and particle filtering

Sentencas: The parameters are then computed through a homotopy based optimization method.
Titulo: Stochastic state-feedback control using homotopy optimization and particle filtering

Sentencas: The control performance resulting from proposed homotopy based optimization method is compared with that of direct optimization and an existing nonlinear control method on a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) stack model.
Titulo: Stochastic state-feedback control using homotopy optimization and particle filtering
